noDocumentImportInPage.description:
Description

Prevents importingnext/documentoutside ofpages/_document.jsxin Next.js projects.
Thenext/documentmodule is intended for customizing the document structure globally in Next.js.
Importing it outside ofpages/_document.jscan cause unexpected behavior and break certain features of the framework.
noDocumentImportInPage.option: This rule has no specific options.
